item.title: RC Circuit Demo
item.author: souren@example.com (Souren Ghosh)
item.description:
RC Circuit Demo

This page demonstrates a simple RC Low-Pass Filter.

Circuit Description

  • Resistor (R): 1 kΩ
  • Capacitor (C): 0.1 µF
  • Input: Vin (signal source, e.g., function generator)
  • Output: Vout measured across the capacitor

The circuit allows low-frequency signals to pass while attenuating high-frequency signals.

item.title: Resistor Circuit Demos
item.author: souren@example.com (Souren Ghosh)
item.description:
Resistor Circuit Demos

This page demonstrates simple resistor-only circuits, including voltage dividers, current limiting, and Wheatstone bridge examples. All circuits are safe and suitable for breadboard experiments.

1. Voltage Divider

Purpose: Divide a voltage into smaller portions.

Components:

  • Resistor R1: 1 kΩ
  • Resistor R2: 1 kΩ
  • Input voltage: Vin
  • Output voltage: Vout
